Name: id
Description: Id of the house.

Name: date
Description: Date when house was sold.

Name: price
Description: Price at which house was sold.

Name: bedrooms
Description: Number of bedrooms in the house.

Name: bathrooms
Description: Number of bathrooms in the house.

Name: sqft_living
Description: Are of house in sqaure feet.

Name: sqft_lot
Description: Are of lot in which house is situation in square feet.

Name: floors
Description: Number of floors (levels) in the house.

Name: waterfront
Description: Indicates whether house is located on waterfront.

Name: view
Description: Rating from 0 to 4 indicating how good the view of the house was (4 being best)

Name: condition
Description: Rating from 1 to 5 indicating condition of the house (5 being best)

Name: grade
Description: Rating from 1 to 13 indicating quality of construction and design (13 being best).

Name: sqft_above
Description: Square footage of house apart from basement

Name: sqft_basement
Description: Area of basement in square feet.

Name: yr_built
Description: Year in which house was built.

Name: yr_renovated
Description: Year in which house was renovated.

Name: zipcode
Description: Zip code

Name: lat
Description: Latitude coordinate of the geograohic location of house

Name: long
Description: Longitude coordinate of the geographic location of house.

Name: sqft_living15
Description: Average living area of 15 nearby houses.

Name: sqft_lot15
Description: Average lot area of 15 nearby houses.
